name: Survive the Food Fight
description:
Survive the Food  Fight is a game made for Friday Night Game Jam in 3 hours

The game shows a food fight in a chaotic highschool cafeteria where everyone is throwing food and objects at each other, your goal is the to survive, the longer you survive, the better highscore you get

Controls  :

Movement : A/D

Aim : Mouse

Assets used : 

Font : https://www.dafont.com/best-school.font

Textures : https://limezu.itch.io/moderninteriors

Everything else was selfmade in 3 hours
